modelView:
{
      "type": "page",
      "name": "pbadmVirtualDomainRoles",
      "components": [
            {
                  "name": "virtualDomainRoles",
                  "type": "resource",
                  "resource": "virtualDomains.pbadmVirtualDomainRoles",
                  "staticData": []
            },
            {
                  "name": "virtualDomainLookup",
                  "type": "resource",
                  "resource": "virtualDomains.pbadmVirtualDomainLookup",
                  "staticData": []
            },
            {
                  "name": "webTailorRolesLookup",
                  "type": "resource",
                  "resource": "virtualDomains.pbadmWebTailorRoles",
                  "staticData": []
            },
            {
                  "name": "SelectVirtualDomainBlock",
                  "type": "block",
                  "label": "",
                  "showInitially": true,
                  "components": [
                        {
                              "name": "selectVirtualDomain",
                              "type": "select",
                              "labelKey": "SERVICE_NAME",
                              "valueKey": "VID",
                              "label": "Virtual Domain",
                              "sourceModel": "virtualDomainLookup",
                              "sourceParameters": {},
                              "model": "selectVirtualDomain",
                              "onUpdate": "$editVirtualDomainRoles.$load();\n$EditRolesForm.$visible=$selectVirtualDomain;\n $roleName.$populateSource();",
                              "required": false,
                              "placeholder": "Select...",
                              "loadInitially": true
                        }
                  ]
            },
            {
                  "name": "EditRolesForm",
                  "type": "block",
                  "showInitially": false,
                  "components": [
                        {
                              "name": "editVirtualDomainRoles",
                              "type": "grid",
                              "model": "virtualDomainRoles",
                              "label": "Edit Roles for selected virtual domain",
                              "parameters": {
                                    "VIRTUAL_DOMAIN_ID": "$selectVirtualDomain"
                              },
                              "allowNew": true,
                              "allowModify": true,
                              "allowDelete": true,
                              "allowReload": true,
                              "pageSize": 5,
                              "components": [
                                    {
                                          "name": "roleName",
                                          "type": "select",
                                          "labelKey": "DESCRIPTION",
                                          "valueKey": "CODE",
                                          "documentation": "Should have some way to forbid selecting existing roles for this domain...",
                                          "label": "Role",
                                          "sourceModel": "webTailorRolesLookup",
                                          "sourceParameters": {},
                                          "model": "ROLE_NAME",
                                          "onUpdate": "",
                                          "required": true,
                                          "placeholder": "Select unique role...",
                                          "value": "",
                                          "loadInitially": true
                                    },
                                    {
                                          "name": "allowAll",
                                          "type": "boolean",
                                          "label": "Allow All",
                                          "value": "0",
                                          "booleanTrueValue": "1",
                                          "booleanFalseValue": "0",
                                          "readonly": false,
                                          "model": "",
                                          "onUpdate": "current_item.ALLOW_GET=current_item.allowAll;\ncurrent_item.ALLOW_POST=current_item.allowAll;\ncurrent_item.ALLOW_PUT=current_item.allowAll;\ncurrent_item.ALLOW_DELETE=current_item.allowAll;",
                                          "loadInitially": true
                                    },
                                    {
                                          "name": "allowGet",
                                          "type": "boolean",
                                          "label": "Allow Get",
                                          "value": "1",
                                          "booleanTrueValue": "1",
                                          "booleanFalseValue": "0",
                                          "readonly": false,
                                          "model": "ALLOW_GET",
                                          "onUpdate": "",
                                          "loadInitially": true
                                    },
                                    {
                                          "name": "allowPost",
                                          "type": "boolean",
                                          "label": "Allow Post",
                                          "value": "0",
                                          "booleanTrueValue": "1",
                                          "booleanFalseValue": "0",
                                          "readonly": false,
                                          "model": "ALLOW_POST",
                                          "loadInitially": true
                                    },
                                    {
                                          "name": "allowPut",
                                          "type": "boolean",
                                          "label": "Allow Put",
                                          "value": "0",
                                          "booleanTrueValue": "1",
                                          "booleanFalseValue": "0",
                                          "readonly": false,
                                          "model": "ALLOW_PUT",
                                          "loadInitially": true
                                    },
                                    {
                                          "name": "allowDelete",
                                          "type": "boolean",
                                          "label": "Allow Delete",
                                          "value": "0",
                                          "booleanTrueValue": "1",
                                          "booleanFalseValue": "0",
                                          "readonly": false,
                                          "model": "ALLOW_DELETE",
                                          "loadInitially": true
                                    },
                                    {
                                          "name": "virtualDomainID",
                                          "type": "hidden",
                                          "value": "$selectVirtualDomain",
                                          "model": "VIRTUAL_DOMAIN_ID",
                                          "loadInitially": true
                                    }
                              ],
                              "loadInitially": true
                        }
                  ]
            }
      ],
      "documentation": "Associate Roles with a virtual domain",
      "title": "Associate Roles with a virtual domain",
      "scriptingLanguage": "JavaScript",
      "label": "Virtual Domain Roles"
}
